Title: An Act Converting Certain Provincial Roads in the Province of Iloilo into National Roads
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 376
An Act Converting Certain Provincial Roads in the Province of Iloilo into National Roads
Section 1. The following provincial roads in the province of Iloilo are converted into and declared as national roads:

a) Concepcion-San Dionisio Road
b) Ajuy-Fuente Bunglas-Jamulawon Road
c) Passi-San Enrique-Garita Road

Section 2. Any provision of law, decree, order, rule or regulation inconsistent with this Act is repealed or modified accordingly.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: April 7, 1983
